description: This file is a shell script that manages DHCP client operations such as start, stop, renew, and release, specifically for a network bridge interface. It includes functions for handling DHCP lease acquisition, release, renewal, and updating system configurations and resolv.conf based on DHCP responses.

methods.name: service_init
methods.description: Initializes the service by fetching the LAN interface name and setting a default hostname if not provided.

methods.name: do_stop_dhcp
methods.description: Stops the DHCP client process on the bridge, kills the process, and removes associated files.

methods.name: do_start_dhcp
methods.description: Starts the DHCP client on the specified LAN interface if not already running, or restarts it if previously stopped.

methods.name: do_release_dhcp
methods.description: Releases the DHCP lease, kills the DHCP client process, and flushes IP addresses on the interface.

methods.name: do_renew_dhcp
methods.description: Renews the DHCP lease by signaling the DHCP client process to renew or restart it if not running.
